article.title: A GEM readout with radial zigzag strips and linear charge-sharing response

multiple_choice_question.text: Which parameter defines the width, space, and interleaving of the zigzag strips?
choices: Period of the zigzag structure in the R direction

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the period of the zigzag structure in the R direction for the original zigzag strip design?
Which board features the closest interleaving to the intended "100% interleaving" design?
What is the approximate gas gain of the ACE#1 board at an applied Vdrift of 3400 V?
What is the relationship between the mean strip multiplicity and the applied high voltage (Vdrift) in the GEM detector?
